attacks.name: Torment
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s attacks. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokémon can’t use that attack.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
